availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James G Dick (First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment.)

body.p: Enlisted September 1, 1861 in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment. Promoted from 2nd to 1st Lieutenant, September 1, 1862. Promoted Captain, December 27, 1863. Died on December 13, 1894 in McCreery County, Ky.

bibl.p: Tarrant, Sergeant E., The Wild Riders of the First Kentucky Cavalry : a History of the Regiment, in the Great War of the Rebellion, 1861-1865 : Pathetic Scenes, Amusing Incidents, and Thrilling Episodes, a Regimental Roster, Prison Life, Adventures, and Escapes (New York: New York Public Library, 1894), 441. "Find A Grave Index," database, FamilySearch (https://familysearch.org/ark:/61903/1:1:QV2W-3M3B : 13 December 2015), James G. Dick, 1894; Burial, , McCreary, Kentucky, United States of America, Carter Cemetery; citing record ID 62741470, Find a Grave, http://www.findagrave.com.
